description: Enable seamless interaction with the Velt API through a dedicated MCP server. Integrate Velt's capabilities directly into your tools to enhance productivity and automation. Simplify API access and management within your development environment.

tools.name: get-organizations
tools.description: Get organizations from Velt. See velt://docs/organizations/get-organizations for detailed documentation.

tools.name: add-organizations
tools.description: Add organizations to Velt. See velt://docs/organizations/add-organizations for detailed documentation.

tools.name: update-organizations
tools.description: Update organizations in Velt. See velt://docs/organizations/update-organizations for detailed documentation.

tools.name: delete-organizations
tools.description: Delete organizations from Velt. This will permanently remove organizations and all associated data. See velt://docs/organizations/delete-organizations for detailed documentation.

tools.name: execute-delete-organizations
tools.description: Execute the deletion of organizations from Velt after confirmation. This should only be called after the user has confirmed they want to proceed with the deletion. See velt://docs/organizations/delete-organizations for detailed documentation.

tools.name: update-disable-state-for-organizations
tools.description: Update disable state for organizations in Velt. See velt://docs/organizations/update-organization-disable-state for detailed documentation.

tools.name: add-organization-user-groups
tools.description: Add organization user groups to Velt. See velt://docs/organization-user-groups/add-groups for detailed documentation.

tools.name: add-users-to-organization-user-group
tools.description: Add users to organization user groups in Velt. See velt://docs/organization-user-groups/add-users-to-group for detailed documentation.

tools.name: delete-users-from-organization-user-group
tools.description: Delete users from organization user groups in Velt. When deleteAll is true, this will remove ALL users from the group. See velt://docs/organization-user-groups/delete-users-from-group for detailed documentation.

tools.name: execute-delete-all-users-from-organization-user-group
tools.description: Execute the deletion of ALL users from an organization user group after confirmation. This should only be called after the user has confirmed they want to proceed with the deletion. See velt://docs/organization-user-groups/delete-users-from-group for detailed documentation.

tools.name: get-documents
tools.description: Get Documents from Velt. See velt://docs/documents/get-documents for detailed documentation.

tools.name: add-documents
tools.description: Add documents to Velt. See velt://docs/documents/add-documents for detailed documentation.

tools.name: update-documents
tools.description: Update documents in Velt. See velt://docs/documents/update-documents for detailed documentation.

tools.name: delete-documents
tools.description: Delete documents from Velt. This will permanently remove documents and all associated collaboration data. See velt://docs/documents/delete-documents for detailed documentation.

tools.name: execute-delete-documents
tools.description: Execute the deletion of documents from Velt after confirmation. This should only be called after the user has confirmed they want to proceed with the deletion. See velt://docs/documents/delete-documents for detailed documentation.

tools.name: update-document-access
tools.description: Update document access in Velt. See velt://docs/documents/update-document-access for detailed documentation.

tools.name: update-document-disabled-state
tools.description: Update document disabled state in Velt. See velt://docs/documents/update-document-disable-state for detailed documentation.

tools.name: get-comment-annotations
tools.description: Get comment annotations from Velt. See velt://docs/comments/get-comment-annotations for detailed documentation.

tools.name: get-comment-annotations-count
tools.description: Get count of comment annotations from Velt. See velt://docs/comments/get-comment-annotations-count for detailed documentation.

tools.name: add-comment-annotations
tools.description: Add comment annotations to Velt. See velt://docs/comments/add-comment-annotations for detailed documentation.

tools.name: update-comment-annotations
tools.description: Update comment annotations in Velt. See velt://docs/comments/update-comment-annotations for detailed documentation.

tools.name: delete-comment-annotations
tools.description: Delete comment annotations from Velt. See velt://docs/comments/delete-comment-annotations for detailed documentation.

tools.name: add-comments
tools.description: Add comments to Velt. See velt://docs/comments/add-comments for detailed documentation.

tools.name: update-comments
tools.description: Update comments in Velt. See velt://docs/comments/update-comments for detailed documentation.

tools.name: delete-comments
tools.description: Delete comments from Velt. See velt://docs/comments/delete-comments for detailed documentation.

tools.name: get-comments
tools.description: Get comments from Velt. See velt://docs/comments/get-comments for detailed documentation.

tools.name: get-users
tools.description: Get users from Velt. See velt://docs/users/get-users for detailed documentation.

tools.name: add-users
tools.description: Add users to Velt. See velt://docs/users/add-users for detailed documentation.

tools.name: update-users
tools.description: Update users in Velt. See velt://docs/users/update-users for detailed documentation.

tools.name: delete-users
tools.description: Delete users from Velt. See velt://docs/users/delete-users for detailed documentation.

tools.name: delete-all-user-data-gdpr
tools.description: Delete all user data from Velt (GDPR compliance). This will permanently remove all user data including comments, reactions, recordings, and notifications. This action cannot be undone. See velt://docs/users/delete-all-user-data-gdpr for detailed documentation.

tools.name: execute-delete-all-user-data-gdpr
tools.description: Execute the deletion of all user data from Velt (GDPR compliance) after confirmation. This should only be called after the user has confirmed they want to proceed with the deletion. See velt://docs/users/delete-all-user-data-gdpr for detailed documentation.

tools.name: get-all-user-data-gdpr
tools.description: Get all user data stored in Velt for GDPR compliance. This includes profile data, comments, reactions, notifications, and recordings. See velt://docs/users/get-all-user-data-gdpr for detailed documentation.

tools.name: get-delete-user-data-status-gdpr
tools.description: Get the status of a user data deletion process for GDPR compliance. Use the jobId returned from the delete-all-user-data-gdpr API. See velt://docs/users/get-delete-user-data-status-gdpr for detailed documentation.

tools.name: get-folders
tools.description: Get folders from Velt. See velt://docs/folders/get-folders for detailed documentation.

tools.name: add-folder
tools.description: Add folder to Velt. See velt://docs/folders/add-folder for detailed documentation.

tools.name: update-folder
tools.description: Update folder in Velt. See velt://docs/folders/update-folder for detailed documentation.

tools.name: update-folder-access
tools.description: Update folder access in Velt. See velt://docs/folders/update-folder-access for detailed documentation.

tools.name: get-notifications
tools.description: Get notifications from Velt. See velt://docs/notifications/get-notifications for detailed documentation.

tools.name: add-notification
tools.description: Add notification to Velt. See velt://docs/notifications/add-notifications for detailed documentation.

tools.name: update-notification
tools.description: Update notification in Velt. See velt://docs/notifications/update-notifications for detailed documentation.

tools.name: delete-notification
tools.description: Delete notification from Velt. See velt://docs/notifications/delete-notifications for detailed documentation.

tools.name: get-notification-config
tools.description: Get notification configuration for users and documents from Velt. See velt://docs/notifications/get-config for detailed documentation.

tools.name: set-notification-config
tools.description: Set notification configuration for users and documents in Velt. See velt://docs/notifications/set-config for detailed documentation.

tools.name: broadcast-livestate-event
tools.description: Broadcast a live state event to Velt. See velt://docs/livestate/broadcast-event for detailed documentation.

tools.name: add-domains
tools.description: Add domains to workspace allowed domains. See velt://docs/workspace/add-domain for detailed documentation.

tools.name: delete-domains
tools.description: Delete domains from workspace allowed domains. See velt://docs/workspace/delete-domain for detailed documentation.
